name: sparkling starlight doily
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
sizes_available: 20 cm (7.8 inches) across if you use lace weight yarn and a 1.75 mm hook
notes:
the sparkling starlight doily pattern is wonderfully easy, and you'll be grinning from ear to ear as you work on it! this little beauty is perfect for anyone who loves to crochet, regardless of experience. it's light and airy, so you'll finish it quickly. plus, it's totally free! soon, you'll have a bunch of these cute doilies everywhere. they're great for almost anything - use them as charming coasters, jazz up your furniture, or hang them as decorations. the possibilities are endless!

experiment with different yarns and hooks to get the size just right. if you use lace weight yarn and a 1.75 mm hook, you'll end up with a doily about 20 cm (7.8 inches) across. whether you're a crochet pro or just starting out, this pattern is a blast. you'll end up with the cutest little doily that will make you smile every time you see it.
